title: Your account is in the process of being transferring?
body: I have a secondary account which I haven't used in a while, and now when I try to log in I get the message: "Your account is in the process of being transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact Player Support." I tried logging in through the website but it tells me my credentials are wrong, so I went through a password recovery and changed the password. I tried to log in again with the new password and it still tells me the username and password do not match. If it matters, I have to accounts, this one and the one I cannot log in with, linked to the same email.

replies.body:
Update: I am now able to sign in through the website, so I tried signing in on the client and I find out I am permanently banned on this account for some reason.
I only got an emailing saying:



"Regards, takashikonne. 

 Your account held an action that violates the Terms of Use of League of Legends game. You can review these terms in http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse 

 Due to the severity of this violation your League of Legends account was banned until Mon Feb 22 22:22:22 UTC 2100 

 If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Support team in https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home 

 Customer support, Riot Games"



I don't understand how I violated the summoner's code, but I have not touched this account since last season to break any rules.

Hmmmmm that is pretty strange. I've pulled up this account, and it looks like there's a chance that it was compromised while you weren't using it. reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you get back in!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Fn6cc74y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-30T20:48:26.818+0000)
>
> Hmmmmm that is pretty strange. I've pulled up this account, and it looks like there's a chance that it was compromised while you weren't using it. reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you get back in!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/30824843?page=1
I have made a ticket about 11 hours ago, still no response.

It's not entirely uncommon for our ticket queues to get backed up once in awhile, but I also noticed that you had responded to that ticket a few times before our agents got to it. Each time you comment without us responding, it will bump the ticket to the back again. Your ticket is in the queue, and you should be getting a quicker response by waiting for their reply first.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Fn6cc74y,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-01T01:44:14.668+0000)
>
> It's not entirely uncommon for our ticket queues to get backed up once in awhile, but I also noticed that you had responded to that ticket a few times before our agents got to it. Each time you comment without us responding, it will bump the ticket to the back again. Your ticket is in the queue, and you should be getting a quicker response by waiting for their reply first.

I wanted to give more information, which I thought was not possible to edit my previous post so I just posted replies, but I didn't know bumping my ticket would result in me needing to wait longer, I guess I'll just wait for help tomorrow.

Update: I have just found out (through lolking) that my account was active 13 days ago, which means that my account indeed seems to be compromised because I have not played on this account (which is even ranked this season) since season6- preseason 7.
